text: Our Lord and admit them into the Gardens of Eden as a place of residence for them that which You have promised them along with whoever were righteous wa-man salaha is a supplement either to the pronominal third person plural suffix hum ‘them’ in wa-adkhilhum ‘and admit them’ or in wa‘adttahum ‘You have promised them’ among their fathers and their wives and their descendants. Surely You are the One Who is the Mighty the Wise in what He does.
